org.xmlcml.cml.element
Class CMLArray

java.lang.Object
  nu.xom.Node
      nu.xom.ParentNode
          nu.xom.Element
              org.xmlcml.cml.base.CMLElement
                  org.xmlcml.cml.element.AbstractArray
                      org.xmlcml.cml.element.CMLArray
All Implemented Interfaces:
CMLConstants, HasArraySize, HasUnits, EuclidConstants
public class CMLArray
extends AbstractArray
implements HasUnits, HasArraySize

user-modifiable class supporting array. * autogenerated from schema use as a shell which can be edited

public CMLArray(java.lang.String[] array)

checkNumericConformability

public void checkNumericConformability(CMLArray array)
                                throws CMLException
can two arrays be used for arithmetic. checks that both arrays are numeric and of same dataType and of same size

Parameters:
array - the array to test; can have different owner
Throws:
CMLException - if not of same numeric data type and size

subtract

public CMLArray subtract(CMLArray array)
                  throws CMLException
subtract an array from this.. result = this - array, owner document = this does not alter this only works if both arrays are numeric and of same dataType

Parameters:
array - the array to subtract; can have different owner
Returns:
new array
Throws:
CMLException - inappropriate dataTypes, unequal arrays

plus

public CMLArray plus(CMLArray array)
              throws CMLException
add an array to this.. result is this + array, owner document = this does not alter this only works if both arrays are numeric and of same dataType

Parameters:
array - the array to add; can have different owner
Returns:
the new array
Throws:
CMLException - inappropriate dataTypes, unequal arrays

convertToSI

public void convertToSI(NamespaceToUnitListMap unitListMap)
converts a real array to SI. only affects array with units attribute and dataType='xsd:double' replaces the values with the converted values and the units with the SI Units

Specified by:
convertToSI in interface HasUnits
Parameters:
unitListMap - map to resolve the units attribute

                     java.lang.String id,
                     java.lang.String namespaceURI)

Specified by:
setUnits in interface HasUnits
Parameters:
prefix - for namespace
id - for unit
